title: Joker review, with spoilers: does Arthur Fleck get the ending he deserves?
text:
Joker, spoiler-filled review:

Warning: the following review is for anyone who has already seen Joker, or who doesn't mind reading spoilers.Click here for Robbie Collin's spoiler-free review

Dir: Todd Phillips; Starring: Joaquin Phoenix, Robert De Niro, Frances Conroy, Zazie Beetz, Brett Cullen, Shea Whigham, Bill Camp, Marc Maron. 15 cert, 122 mins

Since its September premiere at the Venice Film Festival, Joker has had the oddest trajectory of any film I can recall in my 14 years as a critic. Within the space of a month, Todd Phillips’s revisionist comic-book thriller has gone from an Oscar-tipped and critically feted Golden Lion winner – an honour previously bestowed on such momentous works...
